member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.AllClasses
member.summary: Provides helper methods to retrieve classes from assemblies.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.AllClasses.FromAssemblies(System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Returns all visible, non-abstract classes from .
member.returns: All visible, non-abstract classes found in the assemblies.
member.remarks: All exceptions thrown while getting types from the assemblies are ignored, and the types that can be retrieved are returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.AllClasses.FromAssemblies(System.Boolean,System.Reflection.Assembly[])
member.summary: Returns all visible, non-abstract classes from , and optionally skips errors.
member.remarks: If is , all exceptions thrown while getting types from the assemblies are ignored, and the types that can be retrieved are returned; otherwise, the original exception is thrown.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.AllClasses.FromAssemblies(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Reflection.Assembly},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns all visible, non-abstract classes from .
member.remarks: If is , all exceptions thrown while getting types from the assemblies are ignored, and the types that can be retrieved are returned; otherwise, the original exception is thrown.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.AllClasses.FromApplication(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns all visible, non-abstract classes from all assemblies located where the application is installed.
member.param: to include the Unity assemblies; otherwise, . Defaults to .
member.remarks: If is , all exceptions thrown while loading assemblies or getting types from the assemblies are ignored, and the types that can be retrieved are returned; otherwise, the original exception is thrown. These exceptions might be wrapped in a .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.UnityContainerRegistrationByConventionExtensions
member.summary: Provides a set of convenience overloads to the interface to support registration of multiple types.
Registers the supplied types by using the specified rules for name, lifetime manager, injection members, and registration types.
member.param: The types to register. The methods in the class can be used to scan assemblies to get types, and further filtering can be performed using LINQ queries.

A function that gets the types that will be requested for each type to configure. It can be a method from the class or a custom function. Defaults to no registration types, and registers only the supplied types.
A function that gets the name to use for the registration of each type. It can be a method from the or a custom function. Defaults to no name.
A function that gets the for the registration of each type. It can be a method from the class or a custom function. Defaults to no lifetime management.
A function that gets the additional objects for the registration of each type. Defaults to no injection members.
to overwrite existing mappings; otherwise, . Defaults to .
member.returns: The container that this method was called on.
member.exception: A new registration would overwrite an existing mapping and is .

member.summary: Registers the types according to the .
member.param: The convention to determine which types will be registered and how.
to overwrite existing mappings; otherwise, . Defaults to .
member.returns: The container that this method was called on.
